job_tasks.phrase: develop innovative apps for our initiatives and for our business lines with the focus on Vue.js 3 and GenAI.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the core responsibility of building applications that incorporate GenAI, fitting the definition of integrating AI/ML features into a product.

job_tasks.phrase: Create visually appealing and highly interactive user interfaces using modern web technologies and frameworks.
job_tasks.justification: This describes traditional front-end development tasks focused on building user interfaces, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure that end-users have a seamless and engaging experience by translating design concepts into responsive and intuitive web applications.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on the implementation and user experience aspects of web applications, aligning with software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Troubleshoot and solve complex technical issues to maintain the reliability and performance of web applications
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the maintenance and operational aspects of software, which is a core part of software development and integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Write clean and efficient code, adhering to best practices, and ensuring that your solutions are reusable and maintainable.
job_tasks.justification: This describes fundamental software engineering practices related to code quality and maintainability.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with Product Designers, Back-end Engineers, and other team members to bring design concepts to life.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions collaboration with different team members.

soft_skills.phrase: Take ownership of specific features, tasks, or even entire projects, seeing them through from conception to completion and successful release.
soft_skills.justification: This highlights taking responsibility and driving projects to completion, which is a key aspect of ownership and initiative.

soft_skills.phrase: take a pragmatic approach to our solutions.
soft_skills.justification: This directly refers to a pragmatic mindset in problem-solving and solution development.

soft_skills.phrase: you'll be part of a self-organized, multi-disciplinary, Agile team.
soft_skills.justification: Being part of a self-organized, multi-disciplinary team implies strong collaboration and communication skills.
This indicates a culture that values and promotes taking initiative, a component of innovation and ownership.

soft_skills.phrase: coaching and knowledge transfer is part of your day to day job.
soft_skills.justification: This explicitly mentions knowledge transfer and coaching, which are key communication and collaboration activities.

profile.rationale: The job title 'Front-end Developer GenAI' and the listed responsibilities focus heavily on traditional front-end software development tasks (UI creation, user experience, application maintenance, code quality) which fall under Macro-Category A. While GenAI is mentioned as a focus area for the applications being developed, there are no tasks described that involve the development, fine-tuning, or specialized application of AI/ML models themselves (Macro-Category B). This indicates the role is primarily about integrating AI/GenAI features into a software product, fitting the definition of an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the role being a front-end developer focused on building applications that incorporate GenAI. The responsibilities and technologies mentioned align directly with the AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile, leaving little room for ambiguity.
